name: Rapid Fire
description: The bandit has evolved! The train is nearing an interchange with ten consecutive junctions, each with its own moral challenge. There won't be much time to thing between each so prepare yourself.

options.name: Slightly Less Dense Track
options.description: One human is tied down to this track.

options.name: Human-Dense Track
options.description: Five Humans are tied down on the route of the oncoming trolley. Will they die because you fell asleep on the job?
